title: IRTRANS_RCV_4 Function Module
description:
IRTRANS_RCV_4 checkes when CMD = TRUE if the string matches the input

DEV corresponds to DEV_CODE (device code) and the string at the input

KEY corresponds to the KEY_CODE. If the codes match and CMD = TRUE,

then the output Q for a cycle is set to TRUE. For more information about

the function of the device are under IRTRANS_RCV_1.
name: IRTRANS_RCV_4

input.name: CMD
input.description: Indicates whether data for evaluating are available (TRUE if available).

input.name: DEV
input.description: The name of the remote control.

input.name: DEV_CODE
input.description: Device code that corresponds to the remote control.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output signal 0 indicating if the conditions are met.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output signal 1 indicating if the conditions are met.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output signal 2 indicating if the conditions are met.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output signal 3 indicating if the conditions are met.

return_value.description: This function does not return a value.
